thread.title: Myles Kennedy: It's A Very Strange Time In The US, I've Never Seen Anything Like It In My Lifetime [News]
thread.title_full: Myles Kennedy: It's A Very Strange Time In The US, I've Never Seen Anything Like It In My Lifetime [News]

title: Myles Kennedy: It's A Very Strange Time In The US, I've Never Seen Anything Like It In My Lifetime [News]
text:
Discussing Alter Bridge's latest album " The Last Hero ," the musician told Metal Obsession : 
"A lot of stuff on this album is very politically charged. So it's potentially very controversial, and you never quite know how people are going to react to that. But I think that they're emotions that people are relating to, so it's so far, so good." 
He continued: "It's just a very strange time, I've never really seen anything like it in my lifetime. I know it's happened in the past, I think the last time it happened - the dynamic has been to this degree - was probably in the '60s when we had the Vietnam war. 
"I think social media, in conjunction with what's happened with our election, it's added fuel to the fire. So it's been a very interesting time."
